# ToDoList CLI

A simple command-line task manager written in C++.

## Features

* Add tasks
* Delete tasks
* Mark tasks as done
* View all tasks
* Automatically saves tasks to **List.txt**

## How to Run

### Compile

```bash
g++ main.cpp -o main
```

### Run

```bash
./main
```

## File Structure

* **main.cpp** — program source
* **List.txt** — auto-generated file storing tasks
